attributes.comment:
Thank you for this opportunity.

I would like to express my opposition to the fee increase for the I-129. This is a
status used by hospitals to employ health care professionals that are in short
supply. Most hospitals in the US are Non profit entities and this would create a
hardship for them adding to the increase in our health care costs. The I-129 is
also used predominantly by large US corporations that can well afford the
additional costs.

I would like to suggest a separate and new category for health care professionals
only (similar to the E-3 status alloted to Australians only) and at a modest fee
increase to $200.00 per application.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Sheila Murray
